APIsec.role: Product Engineer / Customer Success Engineer / Deployment Engineer
responsibilities: Develop custom scripts and integrations for clients to utilize APIsec's API Security Platform effectively.
Assist clients in deploying and configuring APIsec's platform within their environments, ensuring seamless integration with existing systems.
Provide technical support and troubleshooting assistance to clients, addressing any issues related to deployment and usage of the platform.
Collaborate with the product and engineering teams to relay client feedback, suggestions, and feature requests for continuous improvement of the platform.
Create and maintain technical documentation and guides to assist clients in understanding and utilizing the platform's features.
Conduct training sessions and webinars for clients to educate them on best practices for API security and effective use of the platform.
Create demo videos and sample projects to showcase the capabilities of APIsec's platform to potential and existing clients.
Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in API security to provide informed recommendations to clients.
Participate in client meetings and calls to understand their requirements and provide tailored solutions using APIsec's platform.
Work closely with the sales and marketing teams to support client acquisition and retention efforts through technical expertise.
Utilize tools such as Git, Asana, HubSpot, and Notion to manage projects, track client interactions, and document processes.
Create Asana tasks and Notion documentation to streamline internal workflows and enhance team collaboration.
Build Asana templates for recurring processes to improve efficiency and consistency across projects.
Leverage AI tools like ChatGPT, Claude, Claude Code, HubSpot Breeze, and GitHub Copilot to enhance productivity and deliver high-quality solutions to clients.
Script custom authentication flows for customers utilizing Postman and Burp Suite to test and validate API security configurations.
Provide guidance to entire company of customer issue patterns and resolutions based on direct customer interactions.
performance_metrics: Handle 77% of all customer support tickets.
Achieve on average a <1 day turn around time for customer tenant requests.
Created 15+ custom reports for clients to provide insights and track API security metrics.

responsibilities: Build SaaS applications from scratch using modern web technologies such as React, Next.js, Node.js, Express, Tailwind CSS, and PostgreSQL.
Design and implement RESTful APIs to support front-end functionality and ensure seamless data flow between client and server.
Utilize cloud platforms like Vercel and AWS for deploying and hosting applications, ensuring scalability and reliability.
Implement user authentication and authorization mechanisms using OAuth 2.0 and JWT to secure application data and user sessions.
Optimize application performance through efficient database design and query optimization in PostgreSQL.
Incorporate AI technologies such as ChatGPT, GitHub Copilot, and OpenAI API to enhance application features and improve user experience.
Manage version control and collaboration using Git and GitHub, following best practices for code management.
Create comprehensive documentation and user guides to facilitate application usage and maintenance.
Continuously research and experiment with new technologies and frameworks to stay updated with industry trends and improve development processes.
Collaborate with the founder to conceptualize and develop innovative software products that address market needs.
Design and implement full-stack solutions using technologies such as React, Next.js, Node.js, Express, Tailwind CSS, and PostgreSQL.
Create and maintain RESTful APIs to facilitate communication between front-end and back-end components.
Leverage cloud services like Vercel and AWS for application deployment, ensuring high availability and performance.
Implement robust user authentication and authorization systems using OAuth 2.0 and JWT standards.
Optimize database schemas and queries in PostgreSQL to enhance application efficiency and responsiveness.
Integrate AI tools such as ChatGPT, GitHub Copilot, and OpenAI API to add intelligent features and improve user engagement.
Utilize Git and GitHub for version control and collaborative development, adhering to best practices for code quality and management.
Develop comprehensive documentation and user manuals to support application usage and future development.
Collaborate with a cross-functional team to develop and enhance BuiltInPublic, a platform for developers to share their coding journey publicly.
Design and implement front-end components using React, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS to create a responsive and user-friendly interface.
Develop backend functionality and manage database interactions using Supabase, ensuring data integrity and security.
Implement data fetching and state management using React Query to optimize application performance.
Participate in architecture discussions and technical planning to contribute to the overall development strategy.
Work closely with UI/UX designers to ensure a cohesive and visually appealing user experience.
Review code contributions and provide feedback to maintain high code quality standards.
Maintain and update GitHub documentation, including the README and internal wiki, to support developer onboarding and collaboration.
Contribute to CI/CD pipelines to streamline the development and deployment process.
Offer suggestions to enhance usability and user experience based on user feedback and design principles.
Engage in various aspects of the application, including front-end, back-end, database, authentication, and DevOps, to ensure a well-rounded development approach.
performance_metrics: Successfully launched the BuiltInPublic platform, enabling developers to share their coding journeys and projects publicly.
Improved application performance by optimizing data fetching and state management using React Query, resulting in a smoother user experience.
Enhanced code quality through active participation in code reviews and adherence to best practices, leading to a more maintainable codebase.
Contributed to the development of key features and functionalities that increased user engagement and satisfaction on the platform.
